data.name: Sero Li
data.text: When the Internet boomed in Taiwan in 1996, I was very interested in website construction and started to learn how to write web pages by myself. At that time, ThanksChat V3 was booming, so I turned to research C/C++/C#/ CGI/ Perl and wrote related interactive programs based on this language. Later, due to resource constraints and the emergence of PHP, website development turned to use PHP and other programs. Until now, I am also familiar with SEO operations and RWD CSS during work. MySQL, SQL, and MongoDB, which are required to store data for use and development, have been used in series. APIs such as Google, Facebook, Weibo, WeChat, Line, Message (send letters), Alipay, Oufubao, and Green World have been connected in series, and some have been connected in series. Bank's cash flow service

text: 1996年，隨著台灣網路蓬勃發展，我開始自學網站架設與網頁撰寫。當時，因尋夢園聊天室（ThanksChat V3）的盛行，我投入 C/C++、C#、CGI、Perl 等語言的研究與互動程式開發。
隨著資源與技術演進，轉向 PHP 網站開發至今，工作期間累積了豐富的 SEO 操作、響應式網頁設計（RWD）與多種資料庫（MySQL、SQL、MongoDB）實務經驗。
同時，具備 Google、Facebook、Weibo、WeChat、Line、郵件發送、支付寶、歐付寶、綠界及多家銀行金流服務的 API 串接與整合能力。
這些經歷讓我具備跨語言、多平台整合及全方位網站維護與開發的實力，能獨立支援多客戶系統與資安管理需求。

data.company: 香港商台灣千里目媒體有限公司
text: The main work is responsible for dealing with company system-related issues, developing company system programs, etc.
Responsible for dealing with company system related issues.
Overall use are: HTML, CSS, RWD, JavaScript, jQuery, Perl, Shellcode, PHP, Mysql, MongoDB, Java, SQL, Linux, Git, Memcached, Elasticsearch

data.company: 弘遠數位娛樂股份有限公司
text: The main job is responsible for dealing with website-related issues, managing domains, managing internal NAS, developing company website programs, etc.
Responsible for handling website related issues.
The main work is to develop the systems required by the company, such as learning platforms, cloud systems, data systems, and shopping systems.

Front-end and back-end development, server processing, connection of various cash flows, data planning, cloud system planning and development, etc., the system is developed, planned and integrated by me alone, and some non-program development issues and program debugging are additionally handled during the development period. .
Overall use are: HTML, CSS, RWD, SEO, JavaScript, jQuery, MooTools, C3.js, D3.js, PHP, PHP Smarty, Mysql, Java, SQL, Linux
The main job is to lead three waiters on weekdays, order goods/transfer goods/account/check accounts on and off work.

Manage & inventory the resources on the gas station, assist the station manager to deal with on-site customer complaints, repair the machinery and equipment on the gas station, provide refueling services for customers, and handle the documents handed over by the upper management, etc.
The main job is to write/modify the CASE assigned by the company.
Design web pages/programs/pictures/resources for websites, manage & maintain host system status.
Overall use are: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, CGI/Perl, C++, Linux
主要工作負責處理公司系統相關問題，開發公司系統程式等。
負責處理公司系統相關問題。
總體使用到的有: HTML, CSS, RWD, JavaScript, jQuery, Perl, Shellcode, PHP, Mysql, MongoDB, Java, SQL, Linux, Git, Memcached, Elasticsearch
主要工作負責處理網站相關問題，管理Domain網域，管理內部NAS，開發公司網站程式等。
負責處理網站相關問題。
主要工作是開發公司所需要的系統，學習平台、雲端系統、資料系統、購物系統。
前後端開發、伺服器處理，各金流串接，資料規劃，雲端系統規劃開發等，系統都是由我獨自開發＆規劃＆整合，開發期間要額外處理一些非程式開發問題及程式除錯等。
總體使用到的有: HTML, CSS, RWD, SEO, JavaScript, jQuery, MooTools, C3.js, D3.js, PHP, PHP Smarty, Mysql, Java, SQL, Linux
主要工作、平日帶領著三位服務員，上下班要點貨/調貨/算帳/核帳。
管理&盤點加油站站上資源，輔助站長處理現場客訴問題，維修加油站站上機械設備，替客人加油服務，處理上層交代文件等。
主要工作是撰寫/修改公司分派的CASE。
設計網站用網頁/程式/圖片/資源，管理&維修主機系統狀況，在這期間跟同事也會互相交流程式上的相關問題及解決方法，讓我對於撰寫程式更有方向及想法。
總體使用到的有: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, CGI/Perl, C++, Linux
